category.motivation: The article announces a new product launch by ASTRAUX, which is a company update.

impact.motivation: The article reports a major launch event for ASTRAUX, introducing new product lines and expanding its global presence, directly impacting the node.

time_frame.motivation: The article reports on an upcoming launch event scheduled for September 2025, which is an immediate event affecting the brand.

article_node.title: €5,990 Smart EV Redefines Joyful Mobility
article_node.summary: Chinese brand ASTRAUX will launch its Global Launch Event on September 4, 2025 in Berlin, unveiling the Micro Smart EV AL series, an AI‑powered companion robot Aimon, and AI sunglasses. The micro electric vehicle, certified under EU L6e/L7e, features a distinctive design, in‑car karaoke, ambient lighting, and a drone, targeting urban mobility for all ages. ASTRAUX promotes a “Joy for All” philosophy, offering pre‑orders at discounted prices with a full refund until November 10, 2025. The launch highlights the brand’s focus on affordable, lifestyle‑driven smart technology and aims to make innovative design accessible.
